caption:
Mangurstadh bay - No. 2.

Tripod? Ain't nobody got time for that. This is a mean stack of 25 photos taken 'freestyle' as close as I could get to steady while pushing back against a 35 mile an hour wind at the top of a cliff.

Also saved this special one for 1500
.
.
.
